firefox.notes: Until Firefox 15, Firefox picked the first source element that has a type matching the MIME-type of a supported media format; see bug 449363 for details.

firefox_android.notes: Until Firefox 15, Firefox picked the first source element that has a type matching the MIME-type of a supported media format; see bug 449363 for details.

chrome.notes: Supports a subset of the syntax for resolution switching (using the x descriptor), but not the full syntax that can be used with sizes (using the w descriptor).
